title: Inviting Sparkling Pool, Mini-Blind Window Coverings
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1068 Sq.
A charming community consisting of spacious 2 bedroom – 2 bath and 3 bedroom – 2 bath apartment homes.
Convenient to Lake Conroe, Cricket Hollow is located on FM 1097, ½ of a mile west of the Interstate 45 N.

Spacious Cabinetry And Large Pantry, Roomy Open Kitchen Area, Electric Range With Oven And Built-In Microwave, Full Size Washer-Dryer Connections In Every Unit, Enhanced 9 Foot High Ceilings, Mini-Blind Window Coverings, Extra Outside Storage, Entertainment Serving Bar, Wide Spacious Countertops, Choice Of Distinctive 2 And 3 Bedroom Residences, Private Patio Or Balcony, Dishwasher And Stainless Double Sink With Disposal, Frost-Free Refrigerator With Ice Maker, Ceiling Fans With Light Fixture

Large Community Center, Laundry Facility, Reserved Covered Parking Available, Excellent Willis Island Schools, Minutes from Lake Conroe & other nearby Recreation, Complimentary Office Services, Easy Access To IH-45, Business Center, Caring, Professional Management Team, Organized Services & Resident Activities, Internet Access Computers & Print Station, Equipped Playground, Inviting Sparkling Pool, On-Site Maintenance
